itunes:subtitle: Danny chats with Meredith Marks from The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City about season 1, the reunion, face masking in the finale, and more! Then Danny has a brief convo with Allison Janney, star of the upcoming Breaking News in Yuba County. Finally, ...
description:
Danny chats with Meredith Marks from The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City about season 1, the reunion, face masking in the finale, and more! Then Danny has a brief convo with Allison Janney, star of the upcoming Breaking News in Yuba County. Finally, one of the stars (Wylie Heiner, @wylezzz) of the new HBO Max documentary, Fake Famous, joins the show to discuss the social media experiment.


Meredith Marks Interview: 5:29ish

Allison Janney Interview: 38:05ish

Wylie Heiner (Fame Famous) Interview: 42:58ish
